<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107299</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107299</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205345</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Analyzing the Ad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Analysieren der Anzeige</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Analyse de l'annonce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Analisando o anúncio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Analizzare l'annuncio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάλυση της αγγελίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Analizar el anuncio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will explore the language of advertising and the strategies employed to sell products to consumers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erforschen die Sprache des 
Bekanntmachens und die Strategien, die eingesetzt werden, um Produkte 
an Verbraucher zu verkaufen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants exploreront le langage de la 
publicité et les stratégies utilisées pour vendre des produits aux 
consommateurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes explorarão a língua de anunciar e 
as estratégias empregadas para vender produtos aos consumidores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi esploreranno il linguaggio di 
pubblicità e le strategie impiegate per vendere i prodotti ai 
consumatori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα ερευνήσουν τη γλώσσα της διαφήμισης 
και τις στρατηγικές που υιοθετούνται για να πωλήσουν τα προϊόντα 
στους καταναλωτές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes explorarán el lenguaje de la 
publicidad y las estrategias empleadas para vender productos a los 
consumidores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205345</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
